item.title: rubyçˆ¬json
item.description: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 require "net/http" require "json" uri=URI.parse("http://www.iplant.cn/ashx/getfrps.ashx?key=Abelmoschus%20manihot") response = Net::HTTP.get_response(uri) data=JSON.parse(response.body) puts data["frpscname"]+data["frpsl"]+","+data["frpsdesc"]
